message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you.
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This round only.
I'm being generous considering the inflation, 70% for me, 30% for you.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. Inflation is eating our money!
You should have taken one of my previous offers. Inflation is indeed eating your share.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  I'm taking a huge hit from inflation.  Accept this offer or we both get nothing!
You should have thought of inflation before playing this game with me.
